issue.title: C++: Add developer instructions for building parquet-cpp integration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-26](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-26). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To avoid dependency management problems I added build instructions in `cpp/doc/Parquet.md` for now. See patch https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-26?focusedCommentId=15179003) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12
